title: Queen Latifah steps out in pink pantsuit for visit to Good Morning America
text:
Queen Latifah made an appearance in a pink power suit on Monday morning after her visit to Good Morning American and Live with Kelly and Ryan.

The 49-year-old actress is out promoting her latest gig for the Little Mermaid live musical premiere on ABC on November 5th.

The rapper and actress is set to take the stage as Ursela in the new live-action movie.

Busy day: Queen Latifah made an appearance in a pink power suit on Monday morning after her visit to Good Morning American and Live with Kelly and Ryan

For her appearance, she wore a blush-colored suit that had pinstripes and a single button on the blazer.

She wore a black blouse underneath and had on a pair of black high heels to coordinate. The pant legs seemed a bit long and flared out and almost reached the ground.

Latifah also made an appearance on Ryan Seacrest and Kelly Ripa's talk show where she donned a quick outfit change and opted for a subtle blue suit.

Details: For her appearance, she wore a blush-colored suit that had pinstripes and a single button on the blazer

Heading out: After her appearance she headed about her busy day in the city along with her crew

Earlier this month, the first promo was released showing the rapper in costume as the villain.

The musical is also set to star Auli'i Cravalho as Ariel and John Stamos as Chef Louis.

This special performance comes on the 30th anniversary of the Disney classic and is also set to have live musical numbers as well as clips from the original film.

Ursela: ABC shared this photo of Queen Latifah in the new first look of her as Ursela

'It's just been something that we've been working on for a while. It was perfect timing that it came together,' she said during an interview with ET back in August.

'I'm so excited to play Ursula. I can't wait to see what spin Hamish [Hamilton, the musical's director] helps me put on this character.'

Disney also has plans for a live-action remake which is set to begin production in 2020 which will star 19-year-old Halle Bailey as Ariel.

Having fun! Queen Latifah is spotted heading onto set as she is greeted with loads of high fives

Welcome back! Ryan greeted her with a big hug before Kelly joined in on one too before they began their interview
description: Queen Latifah made an appearance in a pink power suit on Monday morning after her visit to Good Morning American and Live with Kelly and Ryan.The actress is out promoting her latest gig,
